summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to execute a Memorandum of Agreement with King County for including design and construction of transit-related improvements along Rainier Avenue South as a part of the City's Rainier Avenue South Street and Signal Improvement project; authorizing the acceptance, deposit and appropriation of funds to be received for the transit-related improvements; increasing the 1995 Engineering Department Budget; and authorizing the hiring of consultants and proceeding with construction; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
